level.heading: Confidentiality.
level.text: Unless subject to ยง 1-207.42, mediation communications are confidential to the extent agreed by the parties or provided by other law or rule of the District of Columbia.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 16-87, see notes following ยง 16-4201.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon ยง 8 of the Uniform Mediation Act. See 7A, Pt. II, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
